review_data.content: Sehr schön gemacht - tolle Qualität - Kaffee ist sehr gut zubereitet - da sind Profis am Werk - 100%...More

review_data.title: Great coffee in the morning, and a wine bar in the evening
review_data.content: This place serves really good coffee, and has snacks, Italian-style. In the evening it turns into a wine bar, with excellent wines, and serves snacks again. I frequently go for coffee here, as it is good, and the service is friendly and professional.

review_data.title: Arrogance and terrible service
review_data.content: We arrived in the restaurant for our Christmass dinner. The waiter was so extremely arrogant and unfriendly right from the start. We were designated to a table and we were not allowed to sit in the lounge area. The food came from Tschingg below and...More

review_data.title: Sympathisches Lokal an der Rämistrasse
review_data.content: Das Bellavista ist (an alter Lage!) immer einen Besuch wert gewesen, sei es, um gemütlich die Zeitung zu lesen, oder...More

review_data.title: OK but quite expensive
review_data.content: Location is good, ok. Nevertheless the drinks are too expensive. Atmosphere is nice especially at the window (avoid the plastic table/seats, very unstable). Charming.

review_data.title: Satisfactory drinks for afternoon tea
review_data.content: After a long day of walking around the city of Zurich, my family stopped at Bellavista to take a break. While I cannot say anything about the food there (since we only ordered drinks), I thought they drinks were alright; nothing particularly special about them,...More

review_data.title: Bravissimo!
review_data.content: Immer nette Bedienung. Gute Auswahl an Zeitungen, Schinkengipfeli und Lasagne am Freitag sind Spitze. Der Cafè natürlich auch!

review_data.title: Неплохо

review_data.title: Nice place to wind down

review_data.title: Neither bad nor excellent; typically Swiss.
